LanguageData.show_whore_price_factor_on_bed: Show whore price factor on beds

LanguageData.show_whore_widgets_on_bed_desc: Show bed widgets to mark beds for public/private for whoring.
LanguageData.MoneyPrinting_desc: Clients will spawn silver instead of using their own/caravan
LanguageData.ClientAlwaysAccept_desc: Instead of doing rng roll, Clients always accept solicitation.
LanguageData.DebugWhoring_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in Whoring solicitation operations.
LanguageData.RJW_VisitorSickWhore: {0} rejected the offer because {1} does not look healthy
LanguageData.ForServiceDesc: Mark for whoring - Will try to hook up with visitors. - Entertains other colonists if not busy. - Tries to refrain from masturbation while on the job, may cause frustration.
LanguageData.ForServiceRefuseDesc: Won't agree to be a whore
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsWhoreBedDesc: Allow all whores to use this bed to entertain customers.
LanguageData.CommandBedAllowWhoringDesc: Whether owner(s) are allowed to use this bed for whoring.
